message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity that could greatly benefit your business. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $10,000 for the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to work within your budget. In order to reach an agreement that benefits both of us, I am proposing a price of $9,000 for the product.
Thank you for your proposal, Alice. While I understand your position, I still believe we can find a better solution. I would like to counteroffer at $8,800.
I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial price, Bob. Considering the value of the product and our ongoing negotiation, I am willing to accept $9,200 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I will consider it, but I would like to counteroffer at $8,900.
I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $9,100 for the product. This represents a fair compromise between our interests.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $8,950.
Considering the value of the product and our ongoing negotiations, I am willing to accept $9,050 for the product. This represents a fair compromise that respects both our positions.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to meet my budget constraints. I would like to counteroffer at $8,850.
